00098         // "t" = the last time this happened, in seconds since Macintosh reference date January 1 2001
00099         double tTreeVerified ; // last time that the bookmarks were verified
00100         // These actions are:   
00101         //   Change a bookmark or folder name or url, (*)
00102         //   Moved a bookmark or folder (*)
00103         //   Revised any pref in "What to Sort" or "Order of Sorting"
00104         double tFlatViewAffected ; // last time that any action which could modify the flat view in Main Window occured
00105         // These actions are:
00106         //   tree created from disk
00107         //   Change a name, change a url, add item(s), or delete item(s)
00108         //   change filter
00109         BOOL verifyInProgress ;
